DESCRIPTION: This card can be upgraded any number of times.
This card can be upgraded any number of times. Each upgrade is progressively better.
Downgrading a card undoes the effects of one #yUpgrade that has been applied to it.
When attacked, apply #yCaught to the attacker, increasing damage taken by the next attack, and reduce by 1.
Upon reaching 10 #yParalysis, reduce by 10 and #yStun the target.
Increases damage taken from Attacks. Reduced by half each turn.
#yPotion NL Deal 10 damage to an enemy.
#yPotion NL Deal 15 damage to an enemy.
#yPotion NL Deal 20 damage to an enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.
#yPotion NL Deal 30 damage to an enemy and 15 damage to all other enemies.
#yPotion NL Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
#yPotion NL Deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.
#yShocked enemies take damage when attacking. Decreases by 1 each turn.
#yCaught enemies take more damage from the next attack. Decays by half each turn if unused.
Reduces Attack damage dealt. Decays by half after every attack and every turn.
This card can be upgraded the specified number of times. Each upgrade is unique and in a random order.
